title: Ap Kog sorta dead
body:
I still think he is OK, but I am just wondering why he isn't picked mid.. because he has insane wave clear, super strong mid/late game and can get those difficult cs during lane phase with W.

I was also thinking about taking him top lane with tp, because it can be risky diving him when he clears so fast, and once you get zhonyas/ryalais/seraphs dying is even more avoidable.

replies.body: Good riddance if he is. Absolutely toxic in ARAM and garbage in any other queue where Self-Healing isn't reduced and there's no free passively increased mana regen.
It's because his early game can be difficult in regards to mana management and cs. He's incredibly fun and rewarding to play as marksman or mage, though.
Well they just played ap kog in the Europion LCS so I don't know what you are talking about

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=qYyrbRoz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T10:02:54.450+0000)
>
> Well they just played ap kog in the Europion LCS so I don't know what you are talking about

pretty surprising o.o... he is almost never used, I would really love to see things like Ap kog/Orianna top lane...
